Policy: AWS EC2 instance with unrestricted access (0.0.0.0/0) other than HTTP/HTTPS port
Compliance Requirement: Requirement 1: Install and maintain a firewall configuration

Policy: AWS S3 bucket is publicly accessible
Compliance Section: CC6.1 - Logical and Physical Access Controls

Policy: AWS RDS database instance is not encrypted
Compliance Section: A.10.1.1 Policy on the use of cryptographic controls
4.1 Ensure a user for the container has been created

Policy: AWS IAM user has access keys that have not been rotated in 90+ days
